name_hebrew: Nougat and Peanut Cake – Mor Abergil
instructions: Crumble the cornflakes into a bowl and add the spreads to the bowl.
Melt the chocolate with the coconut oil in a small saucepan or in the microwave, pour into the bowl with the cornflakes and mix.
Spread on the bottom of a pan and put in the freezer for at least 10 minutes.
Beat the cream ingredients with a mixer and after the base has frozen, spread the cream on top
and put back in the freezer for at least 3 hours.
Melt the chocolate and cream for the coating in a small saucepan or in the microwave.
After the cream has set, pour the coating on top. It is recommended to keep it frozen.
